description: Gets information about the configuration required to provision the specified product using the specified provisioning artifact. If the output contains a TagOption key with an empty list of values, there is a TagOption conflict for that key. The end user cannot take action to fix the conflict, and launch is not blocked. In subsequent calls to  ProvisionProduct, do not include conflicted TagOption keys as tags, or this causes the error 'Parameter validation failed: Missing required parameter in Tags[N]:Value'. Tag the provisioned product with the value sc-tagoption-conflict-portfolioId-productId.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

nested_items.name: ProvisioningArtifactParameters
nested_items.description: Information about the parameters used to provision the product.

nested_items.name: ParameterKey
nested_items.description: The parameter key.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value.

nested_items.name: ParameterType
nested_items.description: The parameter type.

nested_items.name: IsNoEcho
nested_items.description: If this value is true, the value for this parameter is obfuscated from view when the parameter is retrieved. This parameter is used to hide sensitive information.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the parameter.

nested_items.name: ParameterConstraints
nested_items.description: Constraints that the administrator has put on a parameter.

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: The values that the administrator has allowed for the parameter.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AllowedPattern
nested_items.description: A regular expression that represents the patterns that allow for String types. The pattern must match the entire parameter value provided.

nested_items.name: ConstraintDescription
nested_items.description: A string that explains a constraint when the constraint is violated. For example, without a constraint description, a parameter that has an allowed pattern of [A-Za-z0-9]+ displays the following error message when the user specifies an invalid value:

nested_items.name: MaxLength
nested_items.description: An integer value that determines the largest number of characters you want to allow for String types.

nested_items.name: MinLength
nested_items.description: An integer value that determines the smallest number of characters you want to allow for String types.

nested_items.name: MaxValue
nested_items.description: A numeric value that determines the largest numeric value you want to allow for Number types.

nested_items.name: MinValue
nested_items.description: A numeric value that determines the smallest numeric value you want to allow for Number types.

nested_items.name: ConstraintSummaries
nested_items.description: Information about the constraints used to provision the product.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of constraint.
LAUNCH.
NOTIFICATION.
STACKSET.
TEMPLATE.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the constraint.

nested_items.name: UsageInstructions
nested_items.description: Any additional metadata specifically related to the provisioning of the product. For example, see the Version field of the CloudFormation template.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The usage instruction type for the value.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The usage instruction value for this type.

nested_items.name: TagOptions
nested_items.description: Information about the TagOptions associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The TagOption key.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The TagOption value.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ProvisioningArtifactPreferences
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about preferences, such as Regions and accounts, for the provisioning artifact.

nested_items.name: StackSetAccounts
nested_items.description: One or more Amazon Web Services accounts where stack instances are deployed from the stack set. These accounts can be scoped in ProvisioningPreferences$StackSetAccounts and UpdateProvisioningPreferences$StackSetAccounts.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StackSetRegions
nested_items.description: One or more Amazon Web Services Regions where stack instances are deployed from the stack set. These Regions can be scoped in ProvisioningPreferences$StackSetRegions and UpdateProvisioningPreferences$StackSetRegions.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ProvisioningArtifactOutputs
nested_items.description: The output of the provisioning artifact.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The provisioning artifact output key.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Description of the provisioning artifact output key.

nested_items.name: ProvisioningArtifactOutputKeys
nested_items.description: A list of the keys and descriptions of the outputs. These outputs can be referenced from a provisioned product launched from this provisioning artifact.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The provisioning artifact output key.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Description of the provisioning artifact output key.
